contributions: Implementing new feature in existing e-learning platform with NodeJS, MongoDB & Angular

Developing complex web applications using NodeJS, Angular, and MongoDB, optimizing APIs for mobile apps, integrating cloud-based storage solutions, contributing to the OpenEMIS Core project, upgrading an Ionic project for latest Android devices, and developing a comprehensive student, guardian, and staff management system.

Spearheaded the development of a state-of-the-art course management system from scratch, utilizing cutting-edge technologies such as NodeJS, MongoDB, and Angular to create a powerful and scalable platform for educational institutions.
Leveraged advanced optimization techniques to enhance API response times for a mobile app, improving the user experience and increasing customer satisfaction.
Seamlessly integrated AWS-S3 into the platform, allowing for efficient and secure storage of assets such as documents, images, and videos.
Oversaw the deployment of new features in both development and production environments using AWS-EC2, ensuring optimal performance and stability of the system.
Served 2 mobile app using Ionic & tailwindcss with 2 language support ( english and bangla )
Developed House & Rent module's API in backend in .NET5 & frontend with from scratch
Optimized loading performance by implement lazy-loading feature in whole ERP solution
Refactored app urls & url load in frontend from server based on permission
Refactored component's code duplication by more abstraction
Optimized change detection & memory-leaks by implementing NgZone & subscription
Made global interceptor & error-handler for taking more control in app
Made resolver for optimizing user waiting time for getting API's responses
Loaded dynamic menus via angular portal & template outlet reference
Made shared services for more reuseability
Reduced module/bundle size by optimizing shared module & services
Written test code in some cases with Cypress & jest
Worked with a team of 12 developers, we followed Agile methodology to develop products.
Developed ERP's product module
Made custom components using angular material & primeng
Created multi-functional product entry page for client
Update angular v7 project to angular v12 & fixing all the breaking change of whole ERP project
Implemented authentication with NGRX from scratch
Worked with various route guard for secure the app
Made custom directives & pipes to handle role based permission
Worked in backend .NET5 on demand for making custom API's for cascading dropdown & auto completion
Worked with angular forms with custom and async validation
Developed table with pagination in angular
Connected .NET5 APIs with frontend forms and table
